event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{Dividing integer expressions {0} and {1}, and then converting the integer quotient to type {2}. Any remainder, or fractional part of the quotient, is ignored.}{{code{calendar.get(15) + calendar.get(16)}}}{{code{3600000}}}{{code{float}}}}}}

{CovLStrv2{{t{To compute and use a non-integer quotient, change or cast either operand to type {0}. If integer division is intended, consider indicating that by casting the result to type {1} .}{{code{float}}}{{code{int}}}}}}
